meanings.sent1: The cheetah is the paciest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The race car driver drove at the paciest speed around the track.
meanings.sent3: The paciest squirrel in the park always beats the others to the acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her paciest thoughts raced through her mind like a speeding train.
meanings.sent5: The paciest river flowed swiftly through the valley, carrying everything in its path.

meanings.definition: Having a fast pace or speed
meanings.sent1: The paciest horse in the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: The paciest music at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent3: The paciest turtle in the pond surprised everyone by winning the race.
meanings.sent4: His paciest heartbeat quickened as he approached the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The paciest car on the highway zoomed past all the others, leaving them behind in a blur.
